channel.title: Artifacts on Greenery's Blog Site
channel.description: Recent content in Artifacts on Greenery's Blog Site

item.title: Argo Workflow 3
item.description: Argo Workflow (3) 1 Artifacts When running workflows, it is very common for steps to generate or use artifacts. Typically, an output artifact from one step may be used as an input artifact by a subsequent step. The following workflow specification contains two sequential steps. The first step, named generate-artifact, uses the argosay template to generate an artifact, which is then used by the second step, named print-message, which consumes the generated artifact.
